thread.title: RF IDeas, Inc. is Now Part of Roper Technologies, Inc.
thread.title_full: RF IDeas, Inc. is Now Part of Roper Technologies, Inc.

author: admin
title: RF IDeas, Inc. is Now Part of Roper Technologies, Inc.
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: RF IDeas, Inc. 
ROLLING MEADOWS, Ill. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- RF IDeas, Inc. is pleased to announce it is now part of Roper Technologies, Inc. (ROP), a publicly-traded, diversified technology company. As part of the Roper family, RF IDeas will continue to operate independently providing technology solutions that improve workflow, ensure compliance and security, and enable mobile workforce management. During RF IDeas 20-year history, the company has achieved many first-to-market product innovations and will continue to build on that success. 
“Roper, with its unique approach, long-term mindset and proven track record, is the perfect permanent home for RF IDeas,” said Rick Landuyt, CEO of RF IDeas. “Our team feels incredibly fortunate to have found a partner who shares both our vision and values. Roper’s focus on helping great technology companies grow by creating even more value for their customers is exactly what we wanted and needed. While I am incredibly proud of all of our team’s accomplishments in the past, I am even more excited about our future.” 
RF IDeas has a strong history of delivering both measurable value and a high level of customer satisfaction to the identification solutions market. As part of the Roper family, RF IDeas will be even better positioned to grow. 
About Roper Technologies, Inc. 
Roper Technologies is a constituent of the S&P 500, Fortune 1000, and the Russell 1000 indices. Roper designs and develops software (both software-as-a-service and licensed), and engineered products and solutions for healthcare, transportation, food, energy, water, education and other niche markets worldwide. Additional information about Roper is available on the company’s website at www.ropertech.com . 
About RF IDeas, Inc. 
RF IDeas, Inc. is the leading innovator of employee badge/card readers for in-building authentication, computer access, and identification. RF IDeas designs, develops, and manufacturers a complete line of pcProx® card readers that support nearly every proximity and contactless smart card in use worldwide. RF IDeas readers are used in numerous applications such as single sign-on, secure printing and attendance tracking across several vertical markets including healthcare, manufacturing, government, and enterprise. For the fifth consecutive year, RF IDeas was named to the Inc. 5000 list of the fastest-growing private companies in America. Learn more at www.RFIDeas.com . 
pcProx® is a registered trademark of RF IDeas. All other trademarks, service marks and product or service names are property of their respective owners. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150910006585/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
